Name: Stellarium
About the game: Ride around the many galaxies of Stellarium in a hectic vertical bullet hell, facing off all kinds of creatures and dodging giant storms of bullets. Stellarium is an Arcade-style bullet hell game that draws inspiration from the classic Japanese Danmaku genre and adds a small plus to it. Choose the appropriate abilities to advance through the galaxies of Stellarium. Fight unique enemies with diverse fire patterns and encounter powerful Bosses. FEATURES: Many unique minions 3 special Bosses Explore new biomes Unlock new abilities Shoot 'em all up
